ygData.subject: Re: Quest Help(riverdale)
ygData.msgSnippet: What are stats on the ring and exactly what does it do and what do you use it for? ... From: Schafer, Timothy L 1425  To:
ygData.messageBody:
What are stats on the ring and exactly what does it do and what do you use
it for?


-----Original Message-----
From: Schafer, Timothy L 1425 <Timothy.Schafer@...>
To: 'EQ-Quest@onelist.com' <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 02, 1999 3:25 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Quest Help(riverdale)


>From: "Schafer, Timothy L 1425" <Timothy.Schafer@...>
>
>The Sherrif doesn't give you the ring. It's the deputy down stairs in the
>dinning room in the bank. It's the deputy standing closest to the stairs.
>You say "Am I one with the wall?" If you have earned it he will give it to
>you.
>As for recharging, I believe you just give it to the cleric in the cleric
>guild, and it returns to your inventory immediately. I am not 100% sure on
>the cleric, I just watched a guy fighting Nillipuss do it, I never saw him
>say anything.
>
>You turn the necklaces into the sherrif, and the orc belts into the deputy
>out on the wall in Misty Thicket, you also earn faction for killing those
>orcs and goblins in Misty. I also hear that completing any quests in this
>zone also gives you faction. One in particular is to go by polar bear
>cloaks/skins (I forget which one, do the quest and he tells you which one
>you need), and ways, go to Halas, and I believe you can buy these items
from
>the vendors or from newbies that are out killing low level monsters. If
you
>fill up your entire inventory with these and bring them back and turn them
>in one at a time (or however many he requested at a time) you earn
cash/exp,
>and faction. I heard that 8 bags full is supposed to be enough, but I
don't
>know anything for sure, this is just what I have read, and heard from
people
>that I have met who have this ring.
>
>Wenaddar - 17th level bard of Cazic-Thule
>
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Jeff Hoerig [SMTP:jeffh@...]
>> Sent: Friday, July 02, 1999 2:09 PM
>> To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
>> Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Quest Help(riverdale)
>>
>> From: "Jeff Hoerig" <jeffh@...>
>>
>> ---
>> I would appreciate help on the Squad Ring quest the most...It is really
>> ticking me off that the stupid sherrif will not give me the ring...Once
>> I finally do get the ring, can I get it recharged or do I have to go get
>> a new one? If I can get it recharged, how do I do it? Im a level 16
>> monk.
>> ---
>>
>> I dont think you go to the sheriff to get the ring. You go to the
>> Marshall.
>>
